Name.label: Autosomal recessive distal hereditary motor neuropathy

TextSection.Contents: Distal spinal muscular atrophy type 3 is a rare neuromuscular disease characterized by progressive muscular weakness and atrophy predominantly affecting distal parts of limbs, later involvement of proximal and trunk muscles with marked hyperlordosis and late diaphragmatic dysfunction.

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))

Synonym.label: Autosomal recessive distal spinal muscular atrophy type 3
Distal hereditary motor neuropathy type 3 and type 4
